content: next unfortunately i can t get this to convert well from stitch a bit so that it sits nicely with the next row of stitches excel to any other file format so you will need to use the excel file for this materials row 98 and 99 double_crochet in every stitch across i did not add a border but please feel free to add one if you like i know for a fact that i did not use up anywhere near all the yarn while making this with my 3 75 mm hook and i plan to use the excess to add a border later when i know the gender of the baby who will be getting this blanket pattern top left pattern top right pattern middle left pattern middle right pattern bottom left pattern bottom right
